评论概述: I think I got something different from what I ordered
评论详情: The wig itself is of decent quality.  However, some strands of "hair" did fall out.  It does feel kind of real but at the same time a plastic based wig.  It comes with all of the stuff you need to really put a wig on.  It also feels different from what I ordered because of the style looking a lot like the other one.  I ordered the "brown" but got the "brown-30" maybe.  That's the style I got.  The back looks flat on my head.It also looks and feels disheveled from what it's supposed to be.  But I quickly fixed that.  Either way, for what I ordered, it feels mid tier because of how flat the back looks to me.
